info.title: Control-M Services
info.description: Provides access to BMC Control-M Services

Bearer.description: Token should be received using /login request, and then passed in the Authenticate header with all requests.
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.name: build
tags.description: Compile definitions to verify they are valid for Control-M.

tags.name: provision
tags.description: Install a BigData agent on the current account.

post.description: Deploy the provided definition file (JSON, XML or zip) to Control-M

parameters.name: definitionsFile
parameters.description: A file that contains definitions to be deployed to the server. Can be either a JSON definition file, an XML definition file, or a zip file that contains multiple JSON or XML definition files.

parameters.name: additionalConfiguration
parameters.description: additionalConfiguration to enable skip testing for local connection profile

post.summary: Deploy of Application Integrator job type.
post.description: Deploy an existing Application Integrator job type to agent in order to allow it to run

get.description: Get deployed Application Integrator job types that match the requested search criteria.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are jobTypeName and jobTypeId. Wildcard * is supported

parameters.name: jobTypeName
parameters.description: Job type display name ( or partial name ) for query. It accepts * as wildcard.

parameters.name: jobTypeId
parameters.description: Job type id ( or partial name ) for query. It accepts * as wildcard.

get.description: Get currently local deployed connection profiles according to the search query as JSON.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are ctm, server, agent, type

parameters.name: ctm
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: The name of the agent the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile such as Database, FileTransfer, Hadoop, Informatica, SAP.

get.description: Get currently local deployed connection profiles according to the search query as JSON.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are ctm, agent, type

parameters.name: ctm
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: The name of the agent the connection profile is deployed on

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile such as Database, FileTransfer, Hadoop, Informatica, SAP.

get.description: Get currently centralized deployed connection profiles according to the search query as JSON.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are type and name

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile such as Database, FileTransfer, Hadoop, Informatica, SAP. Use * to get all types

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of centralized connection profile. Supports for *, ?, and comma. By default is *

get.description: Get currently deployed connection profiles status according to the search query as JSON.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are name, type, limit

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number to limit the returned connection profiles. If missed - get all

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: conn profile name (support *, ?, and comma, default is * for all).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: conn profile type (default is * for accounts from all CMs).

206.description: Result with the requested statuses, number of connection profiles exceed the limit.

get.summary: Get deployed connection profiles deployment status
get.description: Get currently deployed connection profiles deployment status according to the search query as JSON.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile such as Database, FileTransfer, Hadoop, Informatica, SAP.

404.description: Connection profiles deployment status not found

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed.

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: The name of the agent the connection profile is deployed on.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile to delete.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the connection profile is deployed.

parameters.name: agent
parameters.description: The name of the agent the connection profile is deployed on.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile to delete.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of connection profile to delete.

post.description: Test connection profile on agent

parameters.name: definitionsFile
parameters.description: A file that contains definitions of the connection profile to be tested

404.description: Connection Profile not found or not valid

post.description: Authenticate the user with the specified password and return a token that can be used later in subsequent requests to access Control-M.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: The credentials to use for login.

401.description: Login failed

post.description: Disconnects the user session specified by the request authentication token, and removes it from the server memory.
Change my password

get.description: Get all the Control-M Archiving jobs that match the search criterias
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are jobname, jobid, ctm, folder, host, application, subApplication, status, orderId, orderDateFrom, orderDateTo, fromTime, toTime, folderLibrary, memName, memLibrary, hostGroup, runAs, logContains, outputContains and numberOfRuns.

parameters.name: ctm
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M server in which the job was ordered from.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M server in which the job was ordered from.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: The name of the parent folder.

parameters.name: fromTime
parameters.description: Job execution start date. Date format - YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: toTime
parameters.description: Job execution end date. Date format - YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: logContains
parameters.description: Job log must contain the given phrase.

parameters.name: outputContains
parameters.description: Job output must contain the given phrase.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The name of the application the jobs belong to.

parameters.name: subApplication
parameters.description: The name of the sub-application the jobs belong to.

parameters.name: orderDateFrom
parameters.description: Indicating a date by which will look for jobs that their order date started afterwards. Date format - YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: orderDateTo
parameters.description: Indicating a date by which will look for jobs that their order date ended before. Date format - YYYY-MM-DD.

200.description: Retrieve all archive jobs matched to search parameters

206.description: Retrieve all archive jobs matched to search parameters, number of jobs exceed the limit

401.description: User not found

503.description: Archive add-on is not installed or down

get.description: Get job log by unique job key

parameters.name: runNo
parameters.description: The execution number in case of multiple executions

200.description: Result with the requested job log

400.description: Unable to get log from archive server

401.description: User not authorized

404.description: Job's log can not be found

503.description: Archive add-on is not installed or down

get.description: Get job output by unique job key

parameters.name: runNo
parameters.description: The execution number in case of multiple executions

200.description: Result with the requested job output

400.description: Unable to get log from archive server

401.description: User not authorized

404.description: Job's output can not be found

503.description: Archive add-on is not installed or down

post.summary: Compile definitions file to check its validity
post.description: Compile the provided definition file (JSON or zip) to verify it is valid for Control-M.

parameters.name: definitionsFile
parameters.description: A file that contains definitions to be compiled. Can be either a JSON definition file, or a zip file that contains multiple JSON definition files.

200.description: File compiled successfully. No errors were found

400.description: Errors were found in input file

post.description: Deploy the provided jobtype to AI server, EM server, and Agent.

parameters.name: definitionsFile
parameters.description: A .ctmai file that contains definitions of jobtype to be deployed to the server.

parameters.name: payloadFile
parameters.description: A JSON file that contains specifications of an agent.

post.description: Transform the provided definitions file (JSON) according to the provided Deploy Descriptor file (JSON).

parameters.name: definitionsFile
parameters.description: A file that contains definitions to be deployed to the server. Can be either a JSON definition file, an XML definition file, or a zip file that contains multiple JSON or XML definition files.

get.summary: Get deployed jobs that match the search criteria.
get.description: Get definition of jobs and folders (in the desired format - JSON or XML) that match the requested search criteria.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are ctm and folder

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the Control-M in which the folder(s) are deployed.

parameters.name: folderName
parameters.description: The name of the required folder(s).

get.summary: Get deployed calendars that match the search criteria.
get.description: Get definition of calendars as json code that match the requested search criteria.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are name, server, type and alias

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: Calendar alias name for z/OS servers.

parameters.name: calendarName
parameters.description: The name of the calendar to be deleted.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The name of the server in which the calendar deploy.

get.summary: Get the allowed values for the specified field in the specified site standard.
get.description: Get the allowed values for the specified field in the specified site standard.

400.description: Cannot get allowed values, because this field does not have any allowed values defined

post.summary: Replace the allowed values for the specified field in the specified site standard.
post.description: Replace the allowed values for the specified field in the specified site standard.

parameters.name: valuesFile
parameters.description: The JSON file with the allowed values

400.description: Cannot replace allowed values, because this field does not have any allowed values defined

get.summary: get list of available images for the requested OS
get.description: Get a list of the images in the system for the requested OS.
get.x-additional-description: Search field is version, values are 'latest' for the latest versions, '*' for all versions, '<number>' for specific versions that contain this number.

parameters.name: os
parameters.description: The OS name of the requested images.

get.summary: Get eligible agents for upgrade that match the requested search criteria.
get.description: Get eligible agents for upgrade that match the requested search criteria from Control-M server.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are type (Agent, MFT, AppPack) and version.

200.description: The eligible agents for upgrade list.

get.summary: Get upgrade activity status for specific upgrade id.
get.description: Get upgrade activity status for specific upgrade id.

delete.summary: Delete upgrade activity status for specific upgrade id.
delete.description: Delete upgrade activity status for specific upgrade id.

get.description: Get all upgrade activities status.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are ctm, agent, fromVersion, toVersion, activity, status and activityName

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Upgrade activity status (Cancel, Running, Completed, TransferCompleted, Failed, Unavailable)

get.description: Returns log of upgrade activity
Get available versions for upgrade

post.summary: Transfer and install a product on an agent
post.description: Transfer and install a product on an agent
Retry upgrade activity
Cancel upgrade activity

post.summary: Uninstall a product from an agent
post.description: Uninstall a product from an agent

get.description: Download report by name.

401.description: No Access to report

get.description: Retrieves a report by name in the desired format (CSV,PDF ,EXCEL). If the report is shared, add [shared:] before the name. This REST API command will be deprecated soon.

401.description: No Access to report

post.description: Sends a request to generate a report asynchronously and returns the request status. If the report is shared, add [shared:] before the name.

401.description: No Access to report

get.summary: Retrieves status information for a report generation request based on the report ID
get.description: Retrieves status information for a report generation request based on the report ID
Retrieves report filters

post.description: Run jobs according to given definitions file (JSON or zip).

parameters.name: jobDefinitionsFile
parameters.description: File that contains the definitions of the jobs to run. It can be a JSON file, or a zip file that can contain one or more JSON files, as well as account(s) information.

parameters.name: additionalConfiguration
parameters.description: additionalConfiguration to enable skip testing for local connection profile

200.description: Run result that can be used to track run jobs.

post.summary: Execute requested jobs in certain folder
post.description: Run jobs from selected folder according to given filter

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: parameters to select the jobs to run

200.description: Run result that can be used to track run jobs.

get.description: Get the job status.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: Job ID returned from the run status action.

get.summary: Get jobs that match the search criteria.
get.description: Get status of jobs that match the requested search criteria.
get.x-additional-description: Search fields are jobname, jobid, ctm, folder, host, application, subApplication, status, orderDateFrom, orderDateTo , fromTime, toTime, folderLibrary, hostGroup, runAs, command, filePath, fileName, workloadPolicy, ruleBasedCalender, resourceLock, resourcePool, description, held, folderHeld, cyclic and deleted.

206.description: Result with the requested statuses, number of jobs exceed the limit.

get.description: Run status of jobs started with the Run service.

parameters.name: runId
parameters.description: Run ID returned from the run action.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: The index of the job status from which to start. returning results

get.description: Get the output returned from a job.

parameters.name: runNo
parameters.description: The execution number in case of multiple executions (0 will get the last execution's output)

200.description: Result with the requested job output.

get.description: Get the statistics from a job.

200.description: Result with the requested job's statistics.

post.description: Run an already executed job (again).

parameters.name: rerunParameters
parameters.description: The JSON file with the restart configuration and parameters

get.description: Get the job execution log.

post.description: Abort job execution.

post.summary: Bypass scheduling cretirias and start the job
post.description: start a job immediately

post.summary: free an already held the job
post.description: free the job
confirm a job that waits for confirmation

post.summary: set job end status to OK
post.description: set job status to OK, post processing action
mark delete as deleted

post.summary: recover a mark for deletion job
post.description: recover a mark for deletion job

get.description: get the reason why the job is in waiting status
get the active job's data by job's order ID

post.description: Modify active job, specified by order id according to given definitions file (JSON).

parameters.name: jobDefinitionsFile
parameters.description: File that contains the definitions of the job to modify. It should be a JSON file.

200.description: Run result that can be used to track run jobs.

currentItems.description: List of the items remained after the action.

convertStatus.description: Currently convert status. ENDED_OK, ENDED_NOT_OK, PARTIAL_RESULTS, UNKNOWN

name.description: The name of the run job.

statuses.description: The list of statuses tracked by the given runId.

itemsPerPage.description: The maximum number of items returned by each status request.

returned.description: The number of the return items by the search.

sort.description: The field the list is sorted by.

nextURI.description: URI to get the next items in the list, if any.

prevURI.description: URI to get the previous items in the list, if any.

retention.description: The retention period to keep archive job by rule. The default is 1. HIDDEN.

archivedType.description: The rule archived data - logs, output or both. The default is both. HIDDEN.

createdTime.description: the time the item was created on (in UTC, in ISO 8601 format)

updatedTime.description: the time the item was last updated (in UTC, in ISO 8601 format)

updatedTimeUTC.description: the time when the item was last updated as string without date format

enabled.description: indicates whether the item is enabled

createdTime.description: the time the item was created on (in UTC, in ISO 8601 format)

updatedTime.description: the time the item was last updated (in UTC, in ISO 8601 format)

username.description: the username of the last user that updated the item

siteStandard.description: the Site Standard Name associested with this policy

status.description: the status of the Site Standard Policy

overwrite.description: In case of update, if the site standard was updated by another user since the last update, the update will fail unless this property is set to true

text.description: Text to be used in condition format. To be used in FIXED_TEXT parts

fieldName.description: The name of the field used in the part. To be used in SourceField and TargetField parts
The name of the field this rule applies to

jobType.description: The job type this rule applies for. Empty job type means it applies to all job types

conditions.description: Job fields conditions to limit when this rule applies

attributeConditions.description: Multi-instance fields conditions to limit on what items this multi-instance rule applies. Should not be used in Must Have rules

onStatement.description: For on-do steps, specify the type of on statement this rule applies to. Omit this field for "any on"

doAction.description: For on-do steps, specify the type of do action this rule applies to. Omit this field for "any do"

subFields.description: Used for list fields to indicate restrictions for items in the list. When mustHave is true, it means the list must contain at least one item with sub-fields that match these restrictions.

mustHave.description: Specifies if this is a must-have rule. Relevant only for list fields. true indicates that the field must contain at least one item that matches this rule's restriction false (or missing) indicates that when the field has items, all of them must match the rule's restriction

validationErrorMessage.description:
The validation error message to show the user when this parameter is invalid.
If not specified, the default error message will be used.

isRequired.description: Specifies if this field or business parameter must have a value. Relevant only for business parameters and simple fields with no sub-fields

possibleOptions.description: List of possible values or possible patterns allowed for the field

numericLimitation.description: Limitation for numeric fields. Can include various ranges separated by comma, e.g. "1, 5-8"

numericUnit.description: In case of Rerun Interval field, specifies the unit the numeric limitation is referring to.

isReadOnly.description: Specifies if this field can be set by the user. Relevant only for boolean fields.

allowUppercaseLetters.description: Determines whether uppercase letters (A-Z) are allowed in the field value

allowLowercaseLetters.description: Determines whether lowercase letters (a-z) are allowed in the field value

allowDigits.description: Determines whether digits (0-9) are allowed in the field value

allowedCharacters.description: A string contains all characters allowed in the field value (all digits or all letters shouldn't be listed here)

disallowedCharacters.description: A string contains all characters not allowed in the field value. This should specified only if the other "allowed..." properties are not set

disallowedOptions.description: List of possible values or possible patterns not allowed for the field

disallowedEnumValues.description: List of enum values not allowed for the field

allowedEnumValues.description: List of enum values that are allowed for the field. If this is empty, than any value is allowed if it is not in the disallowedEnumValues list and it matches the other restrictions. If it is not empty, only values listed in the list or values that matches the specified restrictions (if exists) are allowed.

checkForExistence.description: Check if the field value need to be checked if it exists in the system. E.g. for node_id field - check that the specified host or host group exists in the system

validationErrorMessage.description:
The validation error message to show the user when this rule is not met.
If not specified, the default error message will be used.

values.description: List of possible values for the field. Cannot be specified together with patterns

patterns.description: List of possible patterns for the field. Cannot be specified together with values

value.description: Nomeric value, Even and Odd does not need value

description.description: The description of this possible value. In case of simple text value, this is its display name (if not empty)

partValue.description: The value of the part. Its meaning depends on the part type - For FixedText - it is the part's fixed text For Field - it is the field name For BusinessParameter - it is the parameter name For InternalRule - it is the internal rule name

siteStandardPoliciesFile.description: The name of a specific site standard policies file.

successSiteStandardPoliciesCount.description: Determines the number of successfully added site standard policies.

isDeployDescriptorValid.description: Determines if the site standard policies file file is a valid deploy descriptor file.

persistentConnection.description: Is the connection persistent or create each time it is needed. HIDDEN.

timeout.description: maximum time in seconds to wait (default 60). HIDDEN

suppressPing.description: Suppress ping action to added agent (default false). HIDDEN.

keywords.description: List of words that user can use when searching for a plugin

versions.description: Includes all the versions numbers of the product that exist in the repository
